participants.description: List of participants in the simulation

exchanges.description: Defines the data exchanges between participants in the simulation.

from.description: Name of the source participant sending data

from-patch.description: Specific interface patch or surface on the source participant from which data is sent

to.description: Name of the target participant receiving data

to-patch.description: Specific interface patch or surface on the target participant where data is received

data.description: Type of data being exchanged (e.g., Force, Displacement, Velocity)

data-type.description: Specifies whether the data is a scalar or vector quantity

type.description: Defines the coupling type: 'strong' for tight coupling, 'weak' for loose coupling

title: preCICE Topology Configuration
description: JSON schema defining the topology configuration for precice-case-generate. Specifies participants, exchanges, and their coupling relationships.
